item.title: The Importance of Committing Lock Files in Dependency Management
item.description: In software development, dependency management is a critical aspect that directly impacts the stability and reproducibility of your projects.

item.title: Understanding Technical debt!
item.description: The term “Technical Debt” was coined by Ward Cunningham (one of the authors of Agile Manifesto).

item.description: Have you ever come across a bug that had complex logic, and was incredibly hard to fix?

item.title: Ideas for Successful Agile Teams
item.description: Agile is the most discussed software development methodology, and probably the most widely accepted as the way forward for modern software development teams.
